attributes.action: Fund councils to adapt and use old empty properties for rented housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many sites in and arround towns up and down the country are left empty and in disrepair,large building plots,left to rot,many buildings left damaged and unsafe.Some get to auction,snapped up by developers then either sold on or rented for vast amounts.I know many councils would love to develope these sites but do not have the funds to do so.This would certainly help with housing demands and help give families that security many find hard to get.
